<div>

</div>

**Type**: TSInterface

|PROPERTY|TYPE|DESCRIPTION|
|:---:|:---:|:---:|
|currentTarget|[InfiniteGrid](InfiniteGrid)|<p>An InfiniteGrid instance that triggered this event. </p>|
|groupKey|string \| number \| undefined|<p>First group key. </p>|
|nextGroupKey|string \| number \| undefined|<p>The key of the next group that should replace Virtual Item(placeholder)s. </p>|
|nextGroupKeys|Array&lt;string \| number&gt;|<p>Array of the following group keys that need to be replaced with Virtual Item(placeholder)s. </p>|
|isVirtual|boolean|<p>Whether to request virtual groups corresponding to Virtual Item(placeholder)s. </p>|
|wait|() =&gt; void|<p>Set to standby to request data. </p>|
|ready|() =&gt; void|<p>When the data request is complete, it is set to ready state. </p>|
